vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom random = new SecureRandom();
int x = random.nextInt();
description: The SecureRandom class should be used with a specific cryptographic algorithm for generating random numbers. Using the no-arg constructor will result in using the platform's default algorithm, which may not be suitable for cryptographic purposes.
recommendation: Use SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong() to instantiate the SecureRandom class, which will use the strongest algorithm available on the platform.
